change.item: Readiness for most recent JMail/PHPMailer version in Joomla 3.5.1

fix.item: Duplicatable groups were not correctly checked for changes. So this elements were always marked as changed in notification mails.

addition.item: Added new plugin parameter in order to disable notification mails when editing member data.

fix.item: Userid for updating joomla user email address is now taken from variable content submitted in method onContentAfterSave
Update of joomla user email address is only done if corresponding userid has a valid format
Fixed wrong SQL statement when user is changing his own member data while he is not allowed to change section and section fee assignment

addition.item: Sending of email notifications about new or changed mebmer data
